summary: The 'Stephanie Tubbs Jones Uterine Fibroid Research and Education Act of 2025' addresses uterine fibroids. The bill mandates the Secretary of Health and Human Services to expand research, coordinate with relevant agencies, and establish a database to collect data on Medicaid/CHIP treatment. It also requires the dissemination of public information on fibroids, including awareness, prevalence, and treatment options. Funding is authorized for research and education initiatives from 2026-2030.
